title: Captain Marvel Author Shannon Hale Highlights the Problems With Gendered Library Programs - Her eight year old daughter said, "No girls allowed? That's not fair. I like robots."
text:
Captain Marvel Author Shannon Hale Highlights the Problems With Gendered Library Programs - Her eight year old daughter said, "No girls allowed? That's not fair. I like robots." 
Published By: Geekosystem - Today 
Author Shannon Hale took to Twitter to highlight a problem at her local library: on a poster advertising a robotics program were the words "...
